explains: adv. 绝对地；乐观地；赞成地；明确地；自信地；<技>带正电地

sentences.en: You really must try to start thinking positively.
sentences.cn: 你真得开始努力地积极思考问题。

sentences.en: Investors reacted positively to news of the takeover.
sentences.cn: 投资者对公司收购的消息反应积极。

sentences.en: She was positively glowing with pride.
sentences.cn: 她一副踌躇满志的样子。
